website_summaries.verdict: High tech and top of the line in terms of coffee science.
pros: Features a mechanism that pre-soaks coffee to produce optimal flavor and in bulk as well
Front loading brew basket swings open

customer_reviews.title: perfect so far
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing about my new coffee maker is that it fits under the kitchen cabinet even with the lid open! I was looking for a coffee maker that required no more than 20 inches of clearance with the lid open, and this fit the bill perfectly. The secret is that the coffee filter slides out to the side instead of opening vertically. A separate lid on top opens up vertically in order to pour in the water, adding about 6 inches of height to the unit.
customer_reviews.author: KimK

customer_reviews.title: Brew cycle shuts off multiple times
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker makes the best coffee compared to many brands unfortunately after a month of use it shuts off several times within a brew cycle.
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a week of use.
customer_reviews.text: The coffee maker stopped being able to pump all the water through the coffee after a week of use. Returned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Jaeschke

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine but difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is a good coffee maker, but it weeps water and holds indented water. The coffee basket is sturdy and the swing-out basket holder is nice, but it holds water in its nooks, and you can’t remove it from the rest of the machine unless you remove the pins. The flip-up lid is nice for filling with water, and you can use the other access panel in back of the machine for filling, but ours is under cabinets, and we have to pull the machine to the edge of the counter, so we just use the lid fill point. It makes good coffee, and the delay timer is nice, as is the auto-off function after 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Dana

customer_reviews.title: Very good everyday coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: We've used Mr Coffee drip makers for years and replace them every 2 years or so, not because they fail but we feel at that point it's time. This model has made the best tasting coffee so far. Very easy to use and clean and very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Well made, attractive, well thought out design that works very well. Our pet peev about our last cover maker was that it took so long to make coffee. Not this one, it heats up right away and gets java into your hands quickly. We have had this coffee maker for about a month and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick874

customer_reviews.title: Nice Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker was a little more expensive than what I usually would purchase. But I loved the look and read carefully about the coffee prep. It does make a great cup of coffee. Love the re-useable basket. I have had others that I have not used. Happy to not add another coffee filter to landfill. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Craver

customer_reviews.title: It's a Mr. Coffee.
customer_reviews.text: SOOOO much better than the Braun, or was it Black and Decker that I bought? Make fun of the name if you want, but it is a reliable product! And if good ol' Joe DiMaggio, may he rest in peace, who hit a gazillion home runs, thought it was a good product, by golly, it's good enough for me!
customer_reviews.author: minmi

customer_reviews.title: Front load the water
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean front loading maker. I like it !
customer_reviews.author: Robin K

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the front loading brew basket...its not too tall and easy to fill with water...
customer_reviews.author: miss jean

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product.
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use but unlike our last coffee maker, water ends up underneath the inner brew basket and must be wiped or dried often.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I really like the looks of this coffee pot....makes a great pot of coffee
customer_reviews.author: corey brin

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker leaks. It also will have less coffee than the amount of water I have it in. Will be returning this coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: laurie morgan

customer_reviews.title: became my favorite coffee pot.
customer_reviews.text: very stylish, easier to use than all others (usually Mr Coffee) but this is the best. love the sleek looks and it cleans divinely!
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Jeselskis

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Nice machine.
customer_reviews.text: For a basic coffee maker, this is great. Works really well - love the scheduling feature. Also love the water pour being in the front - makes it much easier to fill with the machine being under the cabinets. Looks great, works great. Cheap. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Nice coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. Nice design, easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Ckn

customer_reviews.title: GOOD LUCK FINDING PARTS
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY THIS MODEL...DROPED CARAFE WAS A HUGE PAIN TO GET NEW ONE....AMAZON DOES NOT SELL MR.COFFEE DOESN'T EVEN SELL REPLACEMENT CARAFE ONLY FOUND ONE PLACE COST ME $35 THATS HALF THE PRICE OF THE WHOLE THING..........RIDICULOUS....BUY ANOTHER MODEL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Can set the timer and wake up to freshly brewed! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water level is in the front very hard to find any coffee pot like this
customer_reviews.text: Love that the water gauge is on the front of this coffee pot. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Invest in another coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of this coffee maker because it was sleek and stylish, and didn't take up a lot of room. I used it everyday for 16 months and it's already defective and will not brew a cup of coffee. Extremely disappointed in this Mr. Coffee - coffee maker. Will not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. She loves the timer feature.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: It does leak and makes loud noise just like the other reviews said
customer_reviews.author: Laura Dale

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought Mr. Coffee, but this is an improved model in looks, operation, etc. Time will tell how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee but....
customer_reviews.text: It makes a great cup of coffee. But don't forget to put the pot on the burner. Forgot one day and had coffee everywhere! Would be a perfect if it had a feature that would not allow it to brew without the pot in place.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: I use this for coffee every morning and am very satisfied with it. It's not fancy and not expensive but delivers excellent coffee reliably. It is also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Bought in Jan 2020, won't brew in Jul 2020.
customer_reviews.text: Used once a day for morning brew. Stopped brewing a pot (only a dribble). Going to website says "water tube might be clogged remove screws in base and clean tube." Hah! screw heads are a proprietary type, with no drivers (torx, phllips, flathead, hex don;t match). Brought another brand.
customer_reviews.author: nocoffeeforme

customer_reviews.title: Functions exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Daily coffee maker. They sure have come a long way with coffeemakers. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Brashear

customer_reviews.title: It arrived broke
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with original packaging and brewed for 45 seconds before shutting off. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: My favorite coffee pot EVER
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for and brews a great cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Waddinkle

customer_reviews.title: Totally Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The Wife Loves it. I bought it for her. I don't drink Coffee.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Leaking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 10 months ago and it's leaking out of the bottom. Beware. Other than that, it's a decent coffee maker. Obviously cheaply built for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lana J

customer_reviews.title: Coffee When I wake up.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and uperate and makes a good pot of coffee. One thing I don't like is coffee dripping from basket after process should be complete and carafe is removed. Machine used in a residential setting.
customer_reviews.author: George Walz

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffer Pot
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean, fits under the counter even when open! And most important good coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cook

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 26 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in July of 18, stopped working in September of 20
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hill

customer_reviews.title: Order it again
customer_reviews.text: Many wonderful wishes to the Amazon people during this corvid19 virus. We appreciate all of you. And well wishes extended to all the world. WE LOVE THIS COFFEE POT SO much that we're ORDERING IT AGAIN....... The swing-out coffee grounds basket it the best selling point. We don't use any feature other than the 'push to start' button. Every night we put the grounds & water in, it's ready for us in the morning. It has other features but this is the way we like to use it, just because there's no telling when we will wake in the morning, we're retired. Timers set on other things but not for our coffee. We want it brewed fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful Texas Skies

customer_reviews.title: AVOID!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new coffee maker and decided to go with a brand that my father used when I was growing up. The coffee maker arrived and is a beautiful machine, unfortunately the original purchase stopped brewing a full pot within a few weeks of arrival. I literally needed to hit “brew” three or four times to brew the whole serving. I returned the pot easily enough and the replacement that Amazon sent me worked fine for approximately a month before this machine malfunctioned in the same way. Now I go to try and return the pot again but Amazon says that it’s outside of the return windo. AVOID this product! Going to try a Ninja pot instead.
customer_reviews.author: JSki

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good - which is good to say about coffee makers. Most break or malfunction after a few months. This Mr Coffee has done really well and is easy to use and program. Has simple features, so it's not hard to setup. I was dubious at first, thinking Mr Coffee would be cheaply built, but I'm impressed now after several months use.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Messy Pot!
customer_reviews.text: The coffee pot was dripping from the outside of the pot as it was brewing, and also when you took the grounds out of the basket all this water laid inside the grooves which dripped down all over the countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: L E M O N, Stay away
customer_reviews.text: My previous Mr Coffee coffee maker lasted 24 wonderful years and was working fine when I bought this model. Now after 6 months and two weeks, it has developed a habit of shutting off well before the brewing cycle is over. It can now take 20 min to brew a large coffee (4cups) (nowhere near a full pot). I am most unhappy. Wish I'd bought a cheap one!
customer_reviews.author: Monocoupe Mike of Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and can be counted on daily.
customer_reviews.text: Makes the coffee much faster than any other coffee maker I have had and looks great. Requires more grounds to achieve the same strength as older model but I do not mind that. If you are conservative of beans, use an alternative method.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good coffee maker. We love that you can set it to start at a certain time. Makes great coffee. The only complaint we have is that after using and changing the filter, the basket leaks water all over the counter. Don't know what the solution to that is but would be a great update.
customer_reviews.author: Blueracer

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to use
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe what a piece of crap Mr Coffee turned out with this model. Hard to clean, too many components that must come out separately. The gauge meter that indicates the number of cups you wish to make is inaccurate. In addition, I had purchased two extra coffee screens that worked well in the replaced model. Though I looked and compared photos and did my best to ensure the new one had the same filter, much to my surprise, they didn't fit. Big disappointment. I do NOT recommend the 12 cup Programmable Coffeemaker. Model BVMC-FBX39
customer_reviews.author: Marty Fannin

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: It got great reviews on consumer reports and does not disappoint. We have used percolators for years but they keep getting cheaper and cheaper. Got sick of buying a new one every 6 months. Love this and the automatic timer. Hot coffee every morning at 6am!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M. Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee makes is wonderful. After one week, I am quite pleased with the coffee it makes, how easy it is to use, and how attractive it is. I have no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: pdubb57

customer_reviews.title: very good. Love swing out coffee bin
customer_reviews.text: So far, very good. Love swing out coffee bin. Love putting in water up front. First unit, did not work. But they sent another and it works. Since I love it, I gave it a 5 star anyway
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Maven in Ormond Beach.

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to use, easy to pour no drips, keeps coffee hot in the pot, we like the 12 cup pot, looks good on the countertop
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Butler

customer_reviews.title: We love the top pour feature (not the back of the coffee maker).
customer_reviews.text: Coffee tastes so good with a good coffee maker. We didn’t realize our OLD maker wasn’t brewing well. Glad it broke and we bought Mr. Coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: This coffee maker is better designed and works quickly
customer_reviews.text: Tried a cusinart for 2x the price. Lasted a month. This coffee maker is better designed and works quickly. Don’t hesitate to buy this one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can brew strong coffee.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking coffee pot. The brew basket filters water.
customer_reviews.author: Montana

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee pot!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Works as advertised and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Used for home where it needs to be ready to work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

product_meta.title: Mr. Coffee 12-Cup Programmable Coffeemaker, Stainless BVMC-FBX39,Black
product_meta.description: The Mr. Coffee 12-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker brings style, taste, and functionality together to create a rich blend that you'll savor for years to come. This model extracts full coffee flavor by presoaking grounds with an even distribution of water, helping release the most flavor possible and brewing more richness into the taste. Additional features help make the process easier, like a transparent water window that lets you see the water level as you fill, a front loading brew basket that swings open so you can easily add your grounds, and an included coffee ground scooper.
feature_bullets: Programmable drip coffee maker with Precision Water System evenly presoaks grounds, helping extract the fullest flavor
Transparent water window prevents overflows by allowing you to see the exact water level as you fill
Front loading brew basket swings open and closed so you can easily add your coffee grounds
Included scoop for a perfectly measured cup of coffee

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars119 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
